content: The beautiful view of the Gwanggyo Lake Park at night!!Such beautiful and stunning lights on the pathway and the building lights as well!
I live near this park and go to take a break from the city to feel a more relaxed and slowed down environment. In the spring and summer it is great from picnics and walks.

Gwanggyo Lake Park is really well maintained, and various facilities such as toilets and bicycle air injectors are well equipped~ The night view at night is really pretty and it seems to be perfect for walking or exercising~!!
Gwanggyo Lake Park surrounded by apartment forests. There are two lakes. If you turn the surrounding road, it's 10km
It's really clean, the facilities are well equipped, and the night view is really a pretty park for a walk ~ 😄😄
It's really spacious, so it's a great place to walk !! ~
Every time I come to Gwanggyo, I feel better.
The surrounding scenery is very nice!
Good for a light walk

There is also an ecological pond and a space to experience, so it is recommended to take your child to play. If you go up to the observatory, you can see the cool breeze and the view, so it was better and the cafe on the first floor was good.
I've been back for a long time, but the number of people who exercise is increasing and it's still good.
If you want to eat or visit a cafe near Lake Park, I recommend Yuancheon Lake, and if you want a quiet walk, I recommend Sindae Lake.

Seoul Anglican Cathedral is outside the walls of the Tashou Palace, across the street from Seoul City Hall. This is the Cathedral of Seoul Diocese of the Anglican Church of Korea. It was only half completed when it was built in 1922 and expanded and completed in 1996.
Very beautiful churches. Very nice, very quiet Koreans go there quite a lot.
Generally, there is no big bright spot, you can see.
The church has a history of nearly 100 years. I like the educational style very much. It is completely open to the outside world. The murals inside are very beautiful.

It is a famous place in Bundang. There are many performances such as various performances, musical concerts, etc. There are not many places to eat nearby, but there are many places to eat at one subway stop.
The performance hall was always far away, but after the Seongnam Art Center was established, it was great to enjoy various things near my house.
I went to see the performance and it was good. Parking is a bit expensive, but ㅎㅎ
Clean and good.
It's right in front of Imae Station. You can see a variety of performances.
It's good to walk and there are many nice statues
It's quiet and nice. It's a famous place in Seongbuk~~~
It's very good. I'm studying abroad now. It's worth visiting here.

Now this purpose has been completely separated, visitors can not enter at all, but the surrounding scenery is also OK, after all, in the past is the Royal garden, the scenery beside is quite beautiful.
Tired of shopping, a good place to rest your feet, in order to order Korean food, is it perfect ah, ha ha...?
This is the mausoleum of the Korean imperial clan, which is quite different from the mausoleum of the ancient Chinese emperor. It's too small to have any special point of view.
Good place, I feel Korean food tastes good.

Located in the underground exhibition area of Guanghuamen Square in the downtown area of Seoul, South Korea, the ground is the bronze statue of Shizong, and the underground is the life story of Shizong. It is worth visiting and the creation process of Korean writing.

Behind the bronze statue of Shizong King in Guanghuamen Square, there is an entrance to the Shizong Story Exhibition Hall. Enter the steps below, see the life of Shizong King, create Korean and other displays, many of which are interactive game areas, lively and interesting, suitable for parent-child travel. Free.
You can visit and learn about the history of North Korea
